<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s an indirect call, give up.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If callee is not an intrinsic, operand 0 is the function to be called.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we cannot assume that the replacement is a function pointer,</span></CodeLine>
